MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH12 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:09PM. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers are on site and in order to complete a repair due to faulty electrical equipment on Carricknowe, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.33AM on 15th February 2021.
